response.overview: Recounts the history and struggle of the Jewish people from the early Zionist movement to the present. Israeli statesman Abba Eban, senator Henry Jackson, Commander of the Exodus Yosi Harel and General Uzi Narkiss discuss the formation of the state of Israel and the liberation of Jerusalem. Covers General Allenby's 1917 capture of Jerusalem, the early struggles at Kibbutz En Gev, the British attack on the refugee ship Exodus, the formation of the state of Israel, the 1948 Arab-Israeli War, the 1956 Sinai campaign and the 1967 Six Day War.
response.title: Apples of Gold
